alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 5:39AM MST until January 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle. Ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Fairfield, Creston, Rockford, Post Falls, Airway Heights, Spokane Valley, Hayden, Grand Coulee, Wilbur, Coeur d`Alene, Cheney, Harrington, Davenport, Downtown Spokane, and Worley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads, bridges, parking lots and sidewalks will be slick this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
